translation: The Blessed Lord said, "Very well! Now I will declare to you My divine glories in their prominence, O Arjuna; there is no end to their detailed description."
commentary: 10.19 Hunt now? very well? They to thee? I will tell you (I) will declare? Divine: divine? Hi indeed? Atmavibhutiyah My glories? Primarily in their prominence? Kurusrestha O best of the Kurus? Not not? Is there is? Inside end? of detail of detail? May of Me.Commentary Now I will tell you of My most prominent divine glories. My glories are infinite it is not possible to describe all of them.
